Name Recipes/Languages/Exp/Concrete

Synopsis Various versions of Exp based on concrete syntax.
Details NoLayout WithLayout
Description We discuss several versions of Exp based on concrete syntax:
  • NoLayout: is the simplest version that does not consider layout symbols in expressions.
  • WithLayout: adds layout information to Exp's synax definition.
